title: Top-down structure
text: On discord, only the project lead can make annoucement. Community member normally does not have a say - not a real DAO isn't it?

title: Public Forum
text: Most of web3 popular solutions are focusing on public forums, sweeping away people looking to build stronger relationship.

title: Not Connected With the NFTs
text: It's quite difficult for people to feel connected with their NFTs and the community.The deeper culture and community connections behind are not fully explored.
